abstract: Barington Capital Group pressures Avon into making board member changes in order to avoid proxy fight with some shareholders.

headline.print_headline: Avon Shakes Up Its Board to Appease Its Shareholders
headline.main: Avon Shakes Up Its Board to Appease Shareholders

snippet: Avon agreed to make changes to its board to avoid a proxy fight with some shareholders who collectively own more than 3 percent of the company.
lead_paragraph: Avon agreed to make changes to its board to avoid a proxy fight with some shareholders who collectively own more than 3 percent of the company.
